attributes.action: Please make it easier to get extra individual help for children in school with Apergers / ASD
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is really hard to get children with SEN the help they need, the idea's are in place, but it is really hard to access these resources, when a child needs extra support in playgrounds, lunchtimes and other social areas of school, its near imposible to get supervisor for them. A statement process takes far too long, and it is too hard to even get the LA to start the process, when the child needs help sooner not 26 weeks later. each week can that this goes on seems like an eternity to a child when they need help. This will shape an Aspergers child mind and behaviour for life. Act Now
